original_title: Richelieu ou La journée des dupes
overview: Dark schemes are being hatched at the court of Louis XIII. Queen Mother Marie de Medici is ready to do anything to get rid of the brilliant Cardinal de Richelieu, whose politics she does not approve of. As the king sinks into illness, a cruel dilemma is offered to him... Who will be the dupes?
title: Richelieu ou La journée des dupes
